definition: Loufan county in Taiyuan 太原[Tai4 yuan2], Shanxi
surname Lou/one of the 28 lunar mansions in Chinese astronomy
to feel vexed/to bother/to trouble/superfluous and confusing/edgy
Loufan county in Taiyuan 太原[Tai4 yuan2], Shanxi

sentences.english: After the Loufan reservoir scenery, should eat featured here.
